## Our Approach

We are a [**pharmacology**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research/area/pharmacology/) lab that integrates [**artificial intelligence**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research/area/artificial-intelligence/) with laboratory data for [drug discovery and development](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research/area/drug-development/) and other [areas of research](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research). [Ongoing projects](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research/projects) are at the  [**Lab GitHub**](https://github.com/mcphersonlab), [Zenodo](https://zenodo.org/communities/mcphersonlab) or listed under [publications](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/publications/)

Our research is driven by three pillars:

1. **More data**

2. **Better analyses**

3. **Data visualization**

## Our GitHub-Centered Workflow

::: {#fig-project-workflow .center}
![A GitHub-centered workflow](research/flowchart.jpeg){width=70%}

::: 

We use [**resources**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research/#research-resources) 
and a **github-centered workflow** built around:
* [Amazon Web Services (AWS)](https://aws.amazon.com/),
* [Ubuntu Linux](https://ubuntu.com/),
* [Docker](https://www.docker.com/),
* [Snakemake](https://snakemake.readthedocs.io/en/stable/),
* [VSCode](https://code.visualstudio.com/),
* [RStudio Cloud](https://rstudio.cloud/),
* [Jupyter Notebooks](https://jupyter.org/) on [Google Colab](https://colab.research.google.com/),
* [Github](https://github.com), 
* [Git](https://git-scm.com/),
* [Anaconda](https://anaconda.org/),
* [R Consortium](https://www.r-consortium.org/),
* [Zenodo](https://zenodo.org/), and
* [LaTeX](https://www.latex-project.org/) via
* [Overleaf](https://www.overleaf.com/)


## Texas-Powered Computing Resources

::: {#fig-project-workflow .center}
![Texas Advanced Computing Center](images/tacc.jpg){width=70%}
:::

[**Texas Advanced Computing Center (TACC)**](https://tacc.utexas.edu/): Computing resources utilized from by the TACC **high-performance computing (HPC) center** designed for *massive, compute-intensive workloads, large-scale data, and scientific workflows* that exceed what a laptop or small server can do.

Please reference TACC in any research report, journal or publication that requires citations.

**Suggested Citation**: 
*The authors acknowledge the Texas Advanced Computing Center (TACC) at The University of Texas at Austin for providing computational resources that have contributed to the research results reported within this paper. URL: http://www.tacc.utexas.edu*

**Minimum Citation**: 
*Texas Advanced Computing Center (TACC) The University of Texas at Austin*

and data-access/sharing infrastructure from the [AWS-Docker project](https://sib-swiss.github.io/AWS-docker/) by the [Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics](https://www.sib.swiss/)
